parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The unpredictable braking can cause accidents, near-misses, and loss of control, putting the driver and passengers at risk.
symptoms: The brakes feel like they release or fail to engage
causing the vehicle to surge forward or accelerate
requiring the driver to press the brake pedal harder to stop the vehicle. This can occur at low speeds
when slowing down
or when braking on hills or curves.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the electronic parking brake can cause the vehicle to roll or move unexpectedly, leading to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The electronic parking brake fails to engage or disengage
causing error messages or warnings.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake system can cause accidents, near-misses, and loss of control, putting the driver and passengers at risk.
symptoms: The brakes fail to engage or feel soft
causing the vehicle to lose braking power or surge forward.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The hybrid braking system issues can cause accidents, near-misses, and loss of control, putting the driver and passengers at risk.
symptoms: The brakes feel like they release or fail to engage
causing the vehicle to surge forward or accelerate
requiring the driver to press the brake pedal harder to stop the vehicle. This can occur when transitioning between regenerative braking and hydraulic braking.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden explosion of the sunroof can cause broken glass to fall into the vehicle, potentially injuring occupants, and may lead to accidents or distractions while driving.
symptoms: Loud noise
shattered glass
sunroof explosion without any apparent reason or external influence.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden acceleration or lurching of the vehicle can lead to accidents, loss of control, or injuries, especially when pedestrians, other vehicles, or intersections are involved.
symptoms: Vehicle lunges or accelerates forward without warning
often when applying brakes or slowing down.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The shaking or malfunctioning of the driver side mirror can obstruct the driver's view, leading to accidents or near-misses, especially when changing lanes.
symptoms: Mirror glass shakes or vibrates excessively
making it difficult to use while driving.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Sudden Loss of Power or Engine Malfunction
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden loss of power or engine malfunction can cause accidents, especially when driving at high speeds, and may lead to injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: Vehicle loses power
check engine light comes on
and error messages appear on the dashboard.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden failure of a tire can cause accidents, especially when driving at high speeds, and may lead to injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: Tire bursts or blows out without warning
often with a loud noise.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Inaccurate Fuel Tank Capacity and Fuel Gauge Issues
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The inability to fill the gas tank to its advertised capacity and inaccurate fuel gauge readings can lead to unexpected fuel depletion, stranding, and potential safety risks, especially on long trips.
symptoms: Unable to fill the gas tank to its advertised capacity (17.1 gallons)
fuel gauge readings inconsistent with actual fuel levels
low fuel warning light not illuminating until near empty
and inaccurate distance-to-empty estimates.
